# UD Romanian TueCL

Language: [Romanian](/ro/index.html) (code: `ro`)<br/>
Family: Indo-European, Romance

This treebank has been part of Universal Dependencies since the UD v2.14 release.

The following people have contributed to making this treebank part of UD: Diana Hoefels, Çağrı Çöltekin.

Repository: [UD_Romanian-TueCL](https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Romanian-TueCL)<br />
Search this treebank on-line: [PML-TQ](https://lindat.mff.cuni.cz/services/pmltq/#!/treebank/udro_tuecl214)<br />
Download all treebanks: [UD 2.14](/#download)

License: CC BY-SA 4.0

Genre: social

Questions, comments?
General annotation questions (either Romanian-specific or cross-linguistic) can be raised in the [main UD issue tracker](https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues).
You can report bugs in this treebank in the [treebank-specific issue tracker on Github](https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Romanian-TueCL/issues).
If you want to collaborate, please contact [diana-constantina&nbsp;•&nbsp;hoefels&nbsp;(æt)&nbsp;student&nbsp;•&nbsp;uni-tuebingen&nbsp;•&nbsp;de, cagri&nbsp;•&nbsp;coeltekin&nbsp;(æt)&nbsp;uni-tuebingen&nbsp;•&nbsp;de].
Development of the treebank happens directly in the UD repository, so you may submit bug fixes as pull requests against the dev branch.

## Description

This is a (currently small) Twitter treebank containing a subset of tweets from [CoRoSeOf](https://github.com/DianaHoefels/CoRoSeOf).

<h2>Tokenization and Word Segmentation</h2>


<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 210 sentences and 4417 tokens.</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 600 tokens (14%) that are not followed by a space.</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus does not contain words with spaces.</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 43 types of words that contain both letters and punctuation. Examples: @Utilizator_fem, -o, într-, @Utilizator_fem1, @Utilizator_fem2, n-, s-, -mi, i-, m-, mi-, te-, -i, -ți, @Utilizator_x, @Utilizator_x1, @Utlizator_fem, @Utlizator_x, Ne-, f*te, pă’, unu', #viol, -AI, -mă, :D, :p, @KlausIohannis, @Utilizator_fem3, @Utilizator_x2, @Utilizator_x3, @Utilzator_x, BMW-uri, Cluj-Napoca, Utilizator_x2, cur\/ă, dracu', ne-futută, p*la, să-, top-uri, v-, ți-</li>
</ul>

<h2>Morphology</h2>

<h3>Tags</h3>

<ul>
<li>This corpus uses 17 UPOS tags out of 17 possible: <a>ADJ</a>, <a>ADP</a>, <a>ADV</a>, <a>AUX</a>, <a>CCONJ</a>, <a>DET</a>, <a>INTJ</a>, <a>NOUN</a>, <a>NUM</a>, <a>PART</a>, <a>PRON</a>, <a>PROPN</a>, <a>PUNCT</a>, <a>SCONJ</a>, <a>SYM</a>, <a>VERB</a>, <a>X</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 8 word types tagged as particles (PART): a, n, n-, nu, s-, sa, să, să-</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 35 lemmas tagged as pronouns (PRON): I, acela, acest, acesta, alt, altul, asta, atât, care, ce, cel, celălalt, ceva, cineva, ea, el, eu, lui, mult, mă, niciunul, nimeni, nimic, orice, se, sine, te, tine, tot, tu, tău, unu, unul, ăla, și</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 30 lemmas tagged as determiners (DET): acela, același, acest, acesta, al, alt, anumit, atât, ce, cel, cât, câteva, câtva, el, fiecare, lui, meu, mult, nici_un, niciun, niște, o, orice, puțin, tot, tu, tău, un, unul, ăst</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>Out of the above, 15 lemmas occurred sometimes as PRON and sometimes as DET: acela, acest, acesta, alt, atât, ce, cel, el, lui, mult, orice, tot, tu, tău, unul</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 4 lemmas tagged as auxiliaries (AUX): avea, be, fi, vrea</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>Out of the above, 3 lemmas occurred sometimes as AUX and sometimes as VERB: avea, fi, vrea</li>
</ul>

    <ul>
      <li>DET: asta, acestui, alea, această, acest, astea, cea, cel, cele, ăsta</li>
      <li>PRON: asta, aia, astia, Ala, aceea, acestea, ceea, cei, ceilalti, ceilalți</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Ind
    <ul>
      <li>DET: o, un, toate, mulți, multe, unui, toți, alte, câteva, niste</li>
      <li>PRON: una, unu, mulți, altul, ceva, cineva, toate, unu', unul, altu</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Int,Rel
    <ul>
      <li>ADV: cum, când, cât, unde, cand, aşa, ce, oare, Cat</li>
      <li>DET: ce, câte</li>
      <li>PRON: ce, care</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Neg
    <ul>
      <li>ADV: nici, niciodata, nimic</li>
      <li>DET: niciun, nicio</li>
      <li>PRON: nimic, nimeni, Nici</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Prs
    <ul>
      <li>DET: mea, ta, lor, a, al, ei, lui, tău, O, meu</li>
      <li>PRON: se, te, eu, tine, mine, mă, o, îți, -o, îmi</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Tot
    <ul>
      <li>NUM: amândoi</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>NumType</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Card
    <ul>
      <li>NUM: 10, 2, 3, 9, doi, 1, 112, 12, 12000, 2,5</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Ord
    <ul>
      <li>NUM: prima, întâi</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>Poss</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Yes
    <ul>
      <li>DET: mea, ta, lor, a, al, ei, lui, tău, meu, nostru</li>
      <li>PRON: tale, Ta, ei, lui</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>Reflex</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Yes
    <ul>
      <li>PRON: se, s-, isi, își, vă, și</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>Person</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>1
    <ul>
      <li>AUX: am, aș, as, fim, fiu, sunt</li>
      <li>AUX-Fin: fim, fiu, sunt</li>
      <li>DET: mea, meu, nostru, tai, tăi</li>
      <li>PRON: eu, mine, mă, îmi, noi, -mi, m-, mi-, ne, ma</li>
      <li>VERB: știu, ador, am, avem, fac, mergeam, stiu, Sper, dau, facem</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin: știu, ador, avem, fac, mergeam, stiu, Sper, am, dau, facem</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>2
    <ul>
      <li>AUX: ești, ai, esti, fii, ați, -AI, ati, erai, o, sunteți</li>
      <li>AUX-Fin: ești, esti, fii, erai, sunteți</li>
      <li>DET: ta, tău, tale, tau</li>
      <li>PRON: te, tine, îți, te-, tu, voi, va, -ți, iti, ti</li>
      <li>VERB: ai, faci, vrei, ești, uite, vezi, zici, articulezi, arăți, ia</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin: faci, vrei, ai, ești, uite, vezi, zici, articulezi, arăți, ia</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>3
    <ul>
      <li>ADV: ce, nimic</li>
      <li>AUX: a, e, sunt, este, ar, era, au, fie, o, -i</li>
      <li>AUX-Fin: e, sunt, este, era, fie, -i, are, ii, s, Îs</li>
      <li>DET: asta, toate, mulți, ce, lor, multe, acestui, alea, ei, toți</li>
      <li>PRON: ce, se, care, o, -o, el, asta, ea, le, nimic</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin: au, are, face, dau, fierbe, e, poate, pot, trebuie, zice</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>



<ul>
  <li><a>Number[psor]</a></li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Plur
    <ul>
      <li>DET: lor, nostru</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li>Sing
    <ul>
      <li>DET: mea, ta, ei, lui, tău, meu, tai, tale, tau, tăi</li>
      <li>PRON: tale, Ta, ei, lui</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<h3>Other Features</h3>


<ul>
  <li><a>Abbr</a>
    <ul>
      <li>Yes
        <ul>
          <li>ADV: etc</li>
          <li>NOUN: Neața, poli</li>
          <li>PRON: mn, unu, unu'</li>
          <li>X: WTF, irl</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>AdpType</a>
    <ul>
      <li>Prep
        <ul>
          <li>ADP: de, la, cu, în, pe, in, din, pentru, ca, după</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>Foreign</a>
    <ul>
      <li>Yes
        <ul>
          <li>ADJ: hot, sexy, SEXSY, nesexy</li>
          <li>ADP: in</li>
          <li>NOUN: BITCH, BRO, MILFă, Schadenfreude, baby, butter, crop, extremis, football, girl</li>
          <li>PROPN: DisneyLand, Survivor, chefi, facebook, tiktok, youtube</li>
          <li>VERB-Fin: cared, trust</li>
          <li>VERB-Inf: say</li>
          <li>X: WTF, irl</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>NumForm</a>
    <ul>
      <li>Digit
        <ul>
          <li>NUM: 10, 2, 3, 9, 1, 112, 12, 12000, 2,5, 20</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li>Word
        <ul>
          <li>NUM: doi, doua, prima, trei, întâi</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>PartType</a>
    <ul>
      <li>Inf
        <ul>
          <li>PART: a</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>Position</a>
    <ul>
      <li>Postnom
        <ul>
          <li>DET: asta, alea, astea, ăsta</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li>Prenom
        <ul>
          <li>DET: ce, acestui, această, acest, alte, niciun, aceleasi, alt, fiecare, nicio</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>Strength</a>
    <ul>
      <li>Strong
        <ul>
          <li>PRON: eu, tine, mine, el, ea, noi, voi, tu, ele, ei</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li>Weak
        <ul>
          <li>PRON: se, te, mă, o, îți, -o, îmi, le, -mi, i-</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>Typo</a>
    <ul>
      <li>Yes
        <ul>
          <li>ADJ: frumoasa, FRUMOSE, SEXSY, apetisanta, arsa, buna, ciudati, comunista, desteapta, divin</li>
          <li>ADP: in, dupa, ex, fara, intre, Intr, ca, fata, fu, impotriva</li>
          <li>ADV: asa, cand, niciodata, ca, decat, dupa, parca, Alaltaieri, Cat, MACAR</li>
          <li>AUX: esti, as, Find, ati, ii, o, s</li>
          <li>AUX-Fin: esti, ii, s</li>
          <li>AUX-Ger: Find</li>
          <li>CCONJ: si, da</li>
          <li>DET: asta, niste, aceleasi, tai, tau, unui</li>
          <li>NOUN: barbat, barbati, carucior, fata, fisa, soti, tarfa, viata, ESCORTA, FUNDULET</li>
          <li>NUM: 2,5, doua</li>
          <li>PART: sa, n</li>
          <li>PRON: isi, ma, va, astia, iti, te, ti, Ala, Nici, aia</li>
          <li>PROPN: Franta, parazitii, romania</li>
          <li>SCONJ: ca, daca, cand</li>
          <li>VERB-Fin: stiu, injure, vad, ACCEPTI, BATA, Incepuse, Intreb, MERITI, Multumesc, PERMITI</li>
          <li>VERB-Inf: lasa, tine</li>
          <li>VERB-Part: facut, Sustinuta, batut, castigat, gresit, linistit, ne-futută, saturat, tratata</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<h2>Syntax</h2>

<h3>Auxiliary Verbs and Copula</h3>

<ul>
<li>This corpus uses 1 lemmas as copulas (<a>cop</a>). Examples: fi.</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>This corpus uses 4 lemmas as auxiliaries (<a>aux</a>). Examples: avea, vrea, fi, be.</li>
<li>This corpus uses 1 lemmas as passive auxiliaries (<a>aux:pass</a>). Examples: fi.</li>
</ul>

<h3>Core Arguments, Oblique Arguments and Adjuncts</h3>

Here we consider only relations between verbs (parent) and nouns or pronouns (child).
<ul>
  <li><a>nsubj</a>
    <ul>
      <li>VERB--PRON-Nom (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--NOUN (18)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--NOUN-Acc,Nom (73)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--PRON-Acc,Nom (44)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--PRON-Nom (11)</li>
      <li>VERB-Ger--NOUN-Acc,Nom (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Inf--NOUN-Acc,Nom (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Inf--PRON-Acc (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Inf--PRON-Acc,Nom (6)</li>
      <li>VERB-Inf--PRON-Nom (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--NOUN (3)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--NOUN-Acc,Nom (16)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--PRON-Acc,Nom (14)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--PRON-Nom (2)</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>obj</a>
    <ul>
      <li>VERB--NOUN (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--NOUN (37)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--NOUN-ADP(pe) (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--NOUN-Acc (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--NOUN-Acc,Nom (70)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--NOUN-Acc,Nom-ADP(pe) (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--NOUN-Nom (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--PRON-Acc (25)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--PRON-Acc,Nom (17)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--PRON-Acc,Nom-ADP(de) (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--PRON-Acc,Nom-ADP(pe) (3)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--PRON-Acc-ADP(pe) (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--PRON-Dat (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Inf--NOUN (3)</li>
      <li>VERB-Inf--NOUN-ADP(pe) (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Inf--NOUN-Acc,Nom (5)</li>
      <li>VERB-Inf--PRON-Acc (6)</li>
      <li>VERB-Inf--PRON-Acc,Nom (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--NOUN (7)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--NOUN-Acc,Nom (10)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--NOUN-Acc,Nom-ADP(de) (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--NOUN-Acc,Nom-ADP(pe) (3)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--PRON-Acc (8)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--PRON-Acc,Nom (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--PRON-Acc,Nom-ADP(pe) (1)</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<ul>
  <li><a>iobj</a>
    <ul>
      <li>VERB-Fin--NOUN (2)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--NOUN-Dat,Gen (4)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--PRON-Acc (5)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--PRON-Dat (27)</li>
      <li>VERB-Fin--PRON-Dat,Gen (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Inf--PRON-Acc (1)</li>
      <li>VERB-Inf--PRON-Dat (3)</li>
      <li>VERB-Part--PRON-Dat (8)</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

<h3>Reflexive Verbs</h3>

<ul>
  <li>This corpus contains 46 lemmas that occur at least once with an <a>expl:pv</a> child. Examples: băga se, abona se, apuca s-, fute mă, holba se, topi mă, umple se, adora te, apropia ma, ascunde se, așeza te, aștepta te, conduce se, crede se, crede te, căca se, călugări s-, da mă, da ne, despărți se, distra te, duce se, enerva ma, evapora se, excita mă, exprima mă, hrăni te, linge te, lovi se, numi se, oferi se, pișa mă, pișa te, plânge vă, preda se, pune se, părea se, simți ne, sătura m-, topi s-, uita se, uita te, uite se, victimiza te, țin se, ține se</li>
</ul>

<h3>Reflexive Passive</h3>

<ul>
  <li>This corpus contains 1 lemmas that occur at least once with an <a>expl:pass</a> child. Examples: vedea se</li>
</ul>

<h3>Verbs with Reflexive Core Objects</h3>

<ul>
  <li>This corpus contains 1 lemmas that occur at least once with a reflexive core object (<a>obj</a> or <a>iobj</a>). Examples: pune își</li>
</ul>

<h3>Relations Overview</h3>

<ul>
<li>This corpus uses 14 relation subtypes: <a>advcl:tcl</a>, <a>advmod:tmod</a>, <a>aux:pass</a>, <a>cc:preconj</a>, <a>ccomp:pmod</a>, <a>discourse:emo</a>, <a>expl:pass</a>, <a>expl:poss</a>, <a>expl:pv</a>, <a>nsubj:pass</a>, <a>obl:agent</a>, <a>obl:pmod</a>, <a>obl:tmod</a>, <a>vocative:mention</a></li>
<li>The following 2 relation types are not used in this corpus at all: <a>dislocated</a>, <a>clf</a></li>
</ul>
